pm_api_token_secret.description: The secret uuid corresponding to a TokenID

pm_dangerously_ignore_unknown_attributes.description: By default this provider will exit if an unknown attribute is found. This is to prevent the accidential destruction of VMs or Data when something in the proxmox API has changed/updated and is not confirmed to work with this provider. Set this to true at your own risk. It may allow you to proceed in cases when the provider refuses to work, but be aware of the danger in doing so.

pm_debug.description: Enable or disable the verbose debug output from proxmox api

pm_http_headers.description: Set custom http headers e.g. Key,Value,Key1,Value1

pm_log_enable.description: Enable provider logging to get proxmox API logs

pm_log_file.description: Write logs to this specific file

pm_log_levels.description: Configure the logging level to display; trace, debug, info, warn, etc

pm_proxy_server.description: Proxy Server passed to Api client(useful for debugging). Syntax: http://proxy:port

pm_timeout.description: How many seconds to wait for operations for both provider and api-client, default is 20m

pm_tls_insecure.description: By default, every TLS connection is verified to be secure. This option allows terraform to proceed and operate on servers considered insecure. For example if you're connecting to a remote host and you do not have the CA cert that issued the proxmox api url's certificate.

current_node.description: The node the qemu guest is currently on.

target_node.description: The node the lxc guest goes to.

additional_wait.description: Value in second to wait after some operations, useful if system is not fast or during I/O intensive parallel terraform tasks

agent_timeout.description: Timeout in seconds to keep trying to obtain an IP address from the guest agent one we have a connection.

automatic_reboot.description: Automatically reboot the VM if any of the modified parameters requires a reboot to take effect.

bios.description: The VM bios, it can be seabios or ovmf

clone_wait.description: Value in second to wait after a VM has been cloned, useful if system is not fast or during I/O intensive parallel terraform tasks

current_node.description: The node the qemu guest is currently on.

default_ipv4_address.description: Use to track vm ipv4 address

default_ipv6_address.description: Use to track vm ipv6 address

define_connection_info.description: By default define SSH for provisioner info

reboot_required.description: Internal variable, true if any of the modified parameters requires a reboot to take effect.

ssh_forward_ip.description: Use to pass instance ip address, redundant

ssh_host.description: The ip address used for the ssh connection, this will prefer ipv4 over ipv6 if both are available

tablet.description: Enable tablet mode in the VM

target_node.description: The node the qemu guest goes to.

target_nodes.description: A list of nodes the qemu guest may be placed on.

unused_disk.description: Record unused disks in proxmox. This is intended to be read-only for now.

vm_state.description: The state of the VM (running, started, stopped)
